short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily generate links for WhatsApp, Snapchat, and Telegram.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Create custom links for WhatsApp, Telegram, and Snapchat with just one click. Social Link Generator is the perfect tool for generating direct links that allow your contacts or followers to instantly access chats, groups, channels, or profiles on the leading messaging and social media platforms. Simplify how you share your information and enhance communication with your friends, clients, or audience.

***** Main features *****

Quick link generation: Create custom links for WhatsApp, Telegram, and Snapchat in seconds.

Direct access: Clicking on the links automatically opens the corresponding apps.

User-friendly interface: Easy to use, with no complicated settings.

Ideal for professionals and content creators: Share links on websites, emails, social networks, or any digital platform.

Take your social interactions to the next level with Social Link Generator.
